name: Telegram Voice Chat Join Notifier
description: Simple Telegram bot that sends notifications when someone joins voice chat

API_ID.description: API_ID of your Telegram Account from my.telegram.org/apps

API_HASH.description: API_HASH of your Telegram Account from my.telegram.org/apps

SESSION_STRING.description: Session string - run generate_string_session.py to get this

CHAT_ID.description: Your group chat ID (use @userinfobot to find it)
